soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on backend software engineering and cloud-native environments, mentioning LLMs only in the context of the applications the platform will serve. It does not detail core GenAI Engineer responsibilities like fine-tuning, RAG, or advanced prompt engineering.
